page.title: 09 SPORT IN GILLING WEST
page.content:
CRICKET { The main sport played in{Gilling}is {cricket.}There are{three cricket} {teams.}There is a{junior}team, a {sixteen and under}team and a{men's } team. There are usually{matches}every {Friday and Saturday.}If there are no matches played it is probably because they have been rained off or there is bad light. The{cricket}matches usually start at {6.00p.m. or 2.00p.m. }The cricket season starts in {late April}and ends in late{August/September.
FOOTBALL
There are{two football teams,}one is a{sixteen and under}team and the other a{men's}team. The soccer season starts in{September}and ends in{April.
